item.title: M4LW Hyprland Dots
item.description: What is Hyprland ? # In a nutshell, Hyprland is a dynamic tiling Wayland compositor based on wlroots that doesn’t sacrifice on its looks. It provides the latest Wayland features, is highly customizable, has all the eyecandy, the most powerful plugins, easy IPC, much more QoL stuff than other wlr-based compositors and more…

item.title: LightlyShaders Effects
item.description: What is it ? # I would like to share a neat little “Effect” if you will, called LightlyShaders which is fork of another project that is a simple KWin/5 effect that simply rounds corners of windows, to do this it uses an opengl shader and is able to round any window, like mpv video for example will have rounded corners.
